name: Senior Clipper Card Processing
short_desc: Processes Senior Clipper (transit) Cards for older adults age 65 and over who live in Fremont, Newark or Union City
description: Fremont Human Services Department's Administration Office processes Senior Clipper Cards for seniors age 65 and older who live in Fremont, Newark or Union City. Accepts applications and can issue Senior Clipper Cards, Monday-Friday, 9-4. Applications can be also downloaded from www.Clippercard.com.Senior Clipper Cards are free but do not come pre-loaded with cash value; recipients need to load money on themselves. Clipper is accepted on AC Transit, BART, and other Bay Area public transportation systems.
